MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 3.15PM in the L20 postcode area of Bootle to make repairs to a fault on our underground cable network . This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3.46PM on 17th January 2021.
